sect1.title: Apache Axiom Events
sect1.para: The plug-in event representation based on Apache Axiom can process XML documents by means of the Streaming API for XML (StAX), which is based the concept of "pull parsing" and can provide performance improvements extracting data from XML documents.
The instructions below have been tested with Apache Axiom Apache AXIOM 1.2.5 and it's dependent jar files. Please visit http://ws.apache.org/commons/axiom/ for more information.

listitem.para: Enable Apache Axiom by adding the even representation to the engine configuration.
Register your application event type aliases.
Send events represented as org.apache.axiom.om.OMDocument or OMElement
